recipe_name: Spinach, paneer cheese and sesame seed salad
author: Phil Vickery
method: Mix all the ingredients together in a large bowl and then spoon into a chefs' ring on a serving plate. Carefully remove the chefs' ring and serve.
ingredients: large handful fresh spinach, washed and chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  85g/3oz paneer cheese, cut into cubes,  Â½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 tbsp sesame seeds
